```{r}
needs(tidyverse, crosstalk, DT, plotly, gt, palmerpenguins)

penguins <- palmerpenguins::penguins

sharedP <- SharedData$new(penguins)


```

# {.sidebar}

Simple static dashboard

```{r}
filter_checkbox("sex", "Sex", sharedP, ~ sex)
```

# Analysis

## Row

### Column

```{r}
#| title: "Slider"

slider_width = 800

htmltools::div(
    
    id = "sliderdiv",
    filter_slider("bill_mm", "bill_length", sharedP, ~bill_length_mm, width = slider_width)
    
)
    
```

### column {width=200}

```{r}
#| content: valuebox
#| title: "Penguin no."

list(
    icon = "tencent_qq",
    colour = "primary",
    value = nrow(penguins)
)

```

## row (height = 60%)

```{r}
#| title: "Flipper vs body mass"

p <- ggplot(sharedP, aes(flipper_length_mm, body_mass_g)) +
                geom_point() 

ggplotly(p)

```
